title: Save over $300 on a lifetime subscription to FastestVPN
content:
Macworld

It’s generally unwise to put a price on your family’s protection. Yet, with the rising cost of VPN services, too many people are doing precisely that. If you want to gift a loved one online security (or upgrade your current setup!), you can now score a lifetime subscription to FastestVPN for only $29.97 to protect yourself and your loved ones without breaking the bank.

FastestVPN provides top-notch protection from hackers. But unlike other VPNs, it doesn’t throttle your connection speeds, meaning you can still browse the web speedily. And since this lifetime subscription package allows you to protect up to 10 users simultaneously, you’re gifting yourself or a loved one digital security on almost every device.

Check out some other handy features from this VPN:

  • The ability to bypass geo-restrictions and unlock any site you want
  • P2P optimized servers for downloading and streaming with complete anonymity 
  • A kill switch that protects your IP from being exposed if your connection is lost
  • And much more!

No wonder FastestVPN is highly rated by TenBestVPNs. Get ahead of holiday shopping by scoring a reliable, secure VPN this season.

Get a lifetime subscription to FastestVPN for the exclusive price of just $29.97. No coupon is required, but this deal ends October 23rd at 11:59pm Pacific!
